properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 7 at 1:29PM EST until February 8 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Blacksburg VA
properties.description:
...Strong Gusty Winds Through This Afternoon...
...Accumulating Snow West of the Blue Ridge...

* WHAT...Winter Storm Warning above 3500 feet with additional snow
of 2 to 4 inches with total accumulations over 6 inches. Winds
gusting as high as 45 mph. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow
with accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high
as 45 mph.

* WHERE...Grayson County.

* WHEN...Until midnight EST tonight.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult especially during the
evening commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty winds will also generate blowing
and drifting snow.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT... ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT ABOVE 3500 FEET
